english_example_sentence: You should look at this beautiful painting and the clock on the wall.
russian_example_sentence: Тебе следует посмотреть на эту красивую картину и часы на стене.
turkish_example_sentence: Sen bu güzel tabloya ve duvardaki saate bakasın.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Sen bu güzel tabloya ve duvardaki saate ______.
